patthana14.35:1.1_0: Niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.35:2.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.35:3.1_0: Niyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.35:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
